title: koTTAnu koTTAnu
sahitya:
koTTAnu koTTAnu sAvadhAnadindiru manave dEvaru koTTAnu


caraNam 1    Dambava nI biDalolle rangana nambidA-kSaNadalli dEvaru
    caraNam 2    drDha mADAtana smaraNe bhaktara biDAdanu ballati karuNi dEvaru
    caraNam 3    purandara viTTalana nambu ninagiha paralOkada sampadagaLanella dEvaru
